name: Shiny Ditto
description:
Ditto (Japanese: メタモン Metamon) is a Generation I Pokémon known for transforming into other Pokémon.

This is a loving rendition of the Pokémon Ditto in its Shiny coloration, built by fans of the Pokémon franchise with help of (partly overlapping) members of the Hollow Knight/Elden Ring communities. It was originally drawn in its normal purple color scheme before changing to its Shiny form.
